summary: This document is a declaration by Denise Johannes, the custodian of records for the Office of the Lieutenant Governor, confirming the receipt of a Grand Jury Subpoena dated August 7, 2019. It certifies that the records provided in response to the subpoena were made in the regular course of business and are accurate.

persons.name: Denise Johannes
persons.context: Denise Johannes declares her role as the custodian of records and certifies the accuracy of the records provided in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena.

persons.name: Alison Moe
persons.context: Alison Moe is mentioned as the signer of the Grand Jury Subpoena requesting records from the business.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A Grand Jury Subpoena was issued requesting specified records.

events.title: Declaration Executed
events.description: Denise Johannes executed the declaration under penalty of perjury confirming the accuracy of the records.

keyFacts: Denise Johannes is the custodian of records for the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.
The Grand Jury Subpoena was issued on August 7, 2019, by Assistant United States Attorney Alison Moe.
The declaration certifies that the records were made in the regular course of business.
The declaration was executed on August 13, 2019.
